text:
Patrick Poivey (18 February 1948 – 16 June 2020) was a French actor. He was known for being a voice actor, having dubbed Bruce Willis's movies from 1988 until his death. He was born in Paris. His best known non-dubbing roles were in "Loulou" (1980) and in ' (2014).
Poivey died on 16 June 2020 from a stroke in Paris, aged 72.
